item.title: JPMorgan says this beauty and wellness stock could be a winner in 2025
item.description: New platform and possible product launches for Oddity in the coming months could spell upside for shares, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Apple's latest earnings beat expectations. Here's what analysts had to say
item.description: Analysts on Wall Street are responding favorably to Apple's latest quarterly results, even though its iPhone revenue came in weaker than expected.

item.title: This bitcoin miner is trading at a 'deep discount' following the tech rout earlier this week, says Bernstein
